sections.label: Selection & codon models
sections.query: ((("dN/dS" OR "codon model" OR HyPhy OR FEL OR MEME OR FUBAR OR BUSTED OR "branch-site") AND (selection OR evolution OR adaptive OR constraint)) OR (("episodic selection" OR "positive selection" OR "diversifying selection") AND (virus OR pathogen))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Cancer evolution & somatic selection
sections.query: ((("cancer evolution" OR "tumor evolution" OR "somatic evolution" OR "clonal evolution") AND (genomics OR sequencing OR phylogen* OR "single-cell")) OR ((cancer OR tumor OR lymphoma OR leukemia) AND ("positive selection" OR "clonal selection" OR "driver mutation" OR "dN/dS" OR "selection inference")) OR (("mutational signature" OR "mutational signatures") AND (cancer OR tumor) AND (evolution OR selection OR phylogeny))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Recombination & mosaicism
sections.query: (((recombination OR "mosaic genome" OR breakpoint OR "gene conversion") AND (virus OR virome OR pathogen)) OR ((RDP OR GARD OR "recombination detection") AND (sequence OR alignment))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Phylodynamics & transmission
sections.query: (((phylodynamic* OR "time-resolved phylogeny" OR BEAST OR "birth-death" OR coalescent) AND (virus OR pathogen)) OR (("genomic epidemiology" OR "phylodynamic inference") AND (outbreak OR transmission))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Urban / built environment virome
sections.query: (((virome OR "viral metagenomics" OR viromics) AND ("built environment" OR urban OR subway OR transit OR surface)) OR (("urban microbiome" OR MetaSUB) AND (virus OR virome OR phage))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Wastewater / WBE viral surveillance
sections.query: ((("wastewater surveillance" OR WBE OR sewage) AND (virus OR virome OR pathogen OR SARS-CoV-2)) OR ((wastewater OR sewage) AND ("viral metagenomics" OR viromics) AND (variant OR lineage OR evolution))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Pandemic preparedness & biosurveillance
sections.query: ((("pandemic preparedness" OR biosurveillance OR "pathogen surveillance") AND (genomics OR sequencing)) OR (("early warning" OR "sentinel surveillance") AND (metagenomics OR sequencing))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Atlases, compendia, reference resources
sections.query: (((atlas OR database OR compendium OR "reference catalog" OR resource) AND (virome OR microbiome OR pathogen)) OR (("large-scale" OR global) AND (virome OR microbiome) AND (metadata OR harmonization))) AND ("computational evolutionary biology" OR "molecular evolution" OR phylogenomics OR phylodynamics OR HyPhy OR "codon model") NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: Metagenomics benchmarking & pipelines
sections.query: ((metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "best practices" OR reproducible OR workflow)) OR ((Kraken2 OR MetaPhlAn OR Bracken OR Centrifuge OR Kaiju) AND (benchmark* OR evaluation))) AND (benchmark* OR workflow OR pipeline OR Snakemake OR Nextflow OR WDL) NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

sections.label: ML for evolution & pathogens
sections.query: ((("machine learning" OR "deep learning" OR transformer) AND (virus OR pathogen OR evolution OR phylogeny)) OR (("protein language model" OR ESM) AND (mutation OR evolution OR fitness))) AND ("machine learning" OR "deep learning" OR transformer OR "foundation model" OR "protein language model" OR ESM) NOT (case report OR randomized OR psychology)

items.title: From single-sequences to evolutionary trajectories: protein language models capture the evolutionary potential of SARS-CoV-2.
items.authors: Kieran D Lamb, Joseph Hughes, Spyros Lytras, Francesca Young, Orges Koci, James C Herzig
items.abstract_snippet: Protein language models (PLMs) capture features of protein three-dimensional structure from amino acid sequences alone, without requiring multiple sequence alignments (MSA). The concepts of grammar and semantics from natural language have been suggested to hav…

items.title: Rapid directed evolution guided by protein language models and epistatic interactions.
items.authors: Vincent Q Tran, Matthew Nemeth, Liam J Bartie, Sita S Chandrasekaran, Alison Fanton, Hyungseok C Moon
items.abstract_snippet: Protein engineering is limited by the inefficient search through a high-dimensional sequence space to find combinations of synergistic mutations. Traditional approaches use stepwise mutation stacking, whereas machine learning methods require extensive datasets…

items.title: Computational insights into the natural phage endolysin linker landscape.
items.authors: Emma Cremelie, Alexandre Boulay, Roberto Vázquez, Yves Briers

items.title: The shared mechanisms and potential diagnostic markers for IgA nephropathy and celiac disease.
items.authors: Shaoguo Tao, Xuemei Fan, Xiaoyou Liu, Yannic Becker, Patricia Schroder, Qian Zhao
items.abstract_snippet: IgA nephropathy (IgAN) and celiac disease (CeD) are autoimmune disorders characterized by dysregulated immune responses; however, the molecular mechanisms underlying their comorbidity remain incompletely understood. Here, we integrated transcriptomic datasets …

items.title: Development and Validation of a Frailty Risk Prediction Model for Preoperative Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer Patients: A Cross-Sectional Study.
items.authors: Hang Yi, Miao Liu, Yihao Chen, Lu Liu, Man Liu, Zhen Wang
items.abstract_snippet: Frailty is increasingly recognized as a predictor of poor surgical outcomes, yet its preoperative assessment in patients with non-small-cell lung cancer (NSCLC) remains challenging. This study aimed to develop and validate a high-performance predictive model f…

items.title: An open-source deep learning-based toolbox for automated auditory brainstem response analyses (ABRA).
items.authors: Abhijeeth Erra, Cayla M Miller, Jeffrey Chen, Elena Chrysostomou, Shannon Barret, Yasmin M Kassim

items.title: Interpretable machine learning for optimized dimethyl ether production from bio-methanol.
items.authors: Mohsen Mokari, Mohammad Rahmani, Saeid Atashrouz
